item.title: NYC Comptroller and mayoral candidate Brad Lander arrested
item.description: NYC Comptroller and Democratic mayoral candidate Brad Lander was arrested by ICE agents Tuesday at immigration court in Manhattan.

item.title: Baltimore Pride celebrates 50 years of supporting LGBTQ+ community
item.description: Baltimore Pride started 50 years ago with a rally near the Washington Monument in the Mount Vernon neighborhood.

item.title: Jury asks three questions during Karen Read trial deliberations
item.description: Jury deliberations are still ongoing in in the Karen Read murder trial. CBS News Boston's Penny Kmitt has more.

item.title: Federal Reserve expected to hold interest rates steady
item.description: The Federal Reserve is meeting for the next two days and will announce its latest decision on U.S. interest rates Wednesday. Javier David, the busines...

item.title: Trump pardons cost victims, taxpayers $1.3 billion, House Democrats' review says
item.description: President Trump's acts of clemency often release criminals with "no further fines, restitution, probation or other conditions."
